metadata.title: CVE-2021-31916 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory write flaw was found in list_devices indrivers/md/dm-ioctl.c in the Multi-device driver module in the Linux kernelbefore 5.12. A bound check failure allows an attacker with special user(CAP_SYS_ADMIN) privilege to gain access to out-of-bounds memory leading toa system crash or a leak of internal kernel information. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is to system availability.
